data.text: @Ale__Uba Sorry, we meant @AsianaAirlines #A380. We should've mentioned that. But you are right, it depends on the airlines! :)
@Debalobo Sorry Debbie, we do not have wifi :(
@Shutterbug_1984 Hi Lee, you may try at airport on the date of departure for bulkhead or exit row seats which is not guaranteed. Thank you.
@fxgallagher Hi Francis, we're glad that you are taking our flight for your journey! Hope to see you soon. :)
Who can guess how many seats are on #A380? http://t.co/OXgWzXr2Md
@adyasha10 It depends on your ticket and you need to provide your ticket information to travel agency to find that out. Thank you.
@adyasha10 Hello Adyasha, you'll have to contact the travel agency where you purchased your ticket for inquiries on fees..
#TGIF! What are your travel plans for the weekend? Eating with us on board? https://t.co/nZvi75NcT4
@airliners_net What a great photo!
@Michael_Ta_ Thanks for sharing, Michael!
@matthotkd Our apologies for the lack of reply to this. Please let us know if there's any way we can help on a future flight..
@davidynamicuno Hope you enjoyed your time in Business Class!
@BaaadMammaJamma Thanks Aaron! Hope you have a great trip! :)
@fxgallagher Welcome aboard, Francis! Can't wait to have you flying with us. :)
@The_Spud @Flyasiana Love this picure!
Welcome! @Avianca  https://t.co/40ajlB46Nh
#AviancaBrasil has joined our #StarAlliances network. Expect more options and explore your travel experience! :) http://t.co/tH5MOa8keD
Experience our night flight from @Chicago! Check the new schedule here: http://t.co/RKmdyNxinM http://t.co/If04NeRofu
@MissEra92 5 years ago? Maybe it's time for another visit to Korea... ;)
@raisinganchor What a beautiful photo! Thanks for sharing!
@DanielleCoogan We don't mean to make you sad, we just want you to fly with us! <3
@andrewjthorp @Wsj2013 Awesome! Hope you enjoy your flight with us! :)
@025Abdou @beekyoote Hope you would have a great experience with Seoul City Tour as well!
Starting on October 25th, our #Chicago to #Seoul flight schedule will change, departing at 23:55pm instead of 12:00pm http://t.co/KWGfJnWRqd
@kpop4life4ever Hope you enjoy your stay in Korea! :)
Anyone interested in #Seoul #CityTour? Take a look for detail information here: http://t.co/HQmILmvg4h https://t.co/U8d6Vbgg9G
@beekyoote Cool. Hope you enjoyed our transit tour in Seoul! :)
Have you ever visited #Gyeonghoeru Pavilion @GyeongbokPalace, one of the greatest historic sites in #Seoul, S. Korea? http://t.co/0hmytRR5dK
A short clip of #Boeing 777-28E/ER smoothly landing @LAX... AWESOME!! https://t.co/MOREF4fMLl

data.text: Did you know? The @StarAlliance lounge at #LAX was voted best Alliance Lounge 2015  by SKYTRAX! http://t.co/aOxlUnJCgH
Check our Internet Special Fares from #LAX to Asia. Reserve your spot and #FLY with #Asiana! http://t.co/zMzqhBIi6o http://t.co/7rderFj4cC
[ATTN] Having difficulty with our website? FYI – we’re doing daily maintenance from 7:50~8:05AM PDT.
Take advantage for #Businessclass #Summer #Specials from Los Angeles to Asia! :) Check online: http://t.co/knKOPhDA06 http://t.co/G6KEZPnrTe
@Platter1199 You can check our routes here: http://t.co/mX32v8GjcG
@Platter1199 Thank you!
Check out the new schedule for a new destination, #Astana, the capital city of Kazakhstan: http://t.co/14xvMWCPPR http://t.co/KsXp9ISIVL
Starting on August 8, 2015, we're adding a new destination in #Astana, Kazakhstan, with Airbus A330-300 aircraft! :) http://t.co/pQ2SQ6oPfc
@Platter1199 did you mean LHR?
You can pre-order in-flight special meal! Check menu and contact reservation center at 1-800-227-4262 to request! http://t.co/2uCw67EmG2
@Platter1199 Yes, this s the official one. Thank you for your concern! :)
Results for "Fly Me to the NYC ASIANA380 Sweepstakes" is out! Click to see if you're a winner: http://t.co/GsKeyEvOQ7 http://t.co/f82ViWIgW7
@s11grace you can visit http://t.co/1W5xLGBvMj or you may contact our Philippine office at 63-2662-8088 (Manila office). Thank you!
@011202 Thank you for choosing Asiana Airlines!
@DeltaBravo33 nice picture! :D
Show off your #kpop skills at the American K-pop Contest for a chance to win a round-trip ticket to Korea w/ Asiana! https://t.co/4Q3rgrRM1T
@jfpost Regarding for customer relations, you can email at customerus@flyasiana.com.
@KyleKhiem Looks cool! That reminds of my childhood as well. :)
@jfpost Hi Frank, we have several email addresses for each dept.! What kind of a question is that? So I can offer you the right one. :)
@KarenGehlanLee You need to purchase a up-gradable fare to upgrade the seat to a business class! We need to check your ticket first.
@heatsun UA랑 아시아나랑 제휴사이기 때문에 적립 가능합니다. 탑승 항공사로 요청하는게 아니라 적립 원하는 항공사로 요청하시되, 탑승 전 요청이 수월하고, 탑승 후에는 원본 탑승권과 전자 항공권이 요구됩니다! 우편 및 온라인 업로드도 가능해요!
@andreaypark Thanks for coming on board with us. Hope to see you again soon! :)
Thanks for flying with us @WUGUSAVolley! https://t.co/fz1hyAmyPE

data.text: If you are traveling with a pet, check out the following useful link: http://t.co/GNqhXN2ZR0 http://t.co/XtrMvZEn45
Did you know that you can simply log-in to our mobile app for a digital membership card? Please visit at http://t.co/bRE9WKhs3z!
As of June 30th, Asiana is operating a #B777 to #Rome, #Italy via OZ561/562! More info: http://t.co/MYGaJoc5BV http://t.co/Rkswrg0gJ8
@SQFFP @AirCanada Hello Freddy. Normally, it takes about a week after your Star Alliance flight for the miles to post on your OZ account.
Your last chance to win a roundtrip ticket from JFK to ICN is here! Sweepstakes ends soon.. what are you waiting for? http://t.co/hEK2LtxrDI
#TGIF. Ready to take off for the weekend? #ASIANA380 at JFK Airport (Photo Credits: http://t.co/cWti847Frp) http://t.co/i6LGaFwGqA
@_yojazz Hello Jazz -- currently, we do not offer wi-fi services on board. Thank you.
@pawpewpiwstheo Our website has been working on our end. What error message are you seeing?
@butterfli253 Hello, you may submit your inquiries/concerns here: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ. Thank you.
@dzkeez We're following! Thank you.

RT @bh0111: HND, Tokyo (JPN / 2015)
#A330 #AsianaAirlines #HND http://t.co/i8QtOTfNwL
@dzkeez Hello Dino, please let us know if you need any assistance..

data.text: @IvanGlezT Hello Ivan. You are allowed up to 23kg per baggage for LAX-ICN route.
@map_happy Thanks for sharing!
@aicapascual01 Hello Aica, you may contact our reservation center at 800-227-4262 for immediate assistance. Thank you.
@sukebean Hello Suk, sorry to have disappointed. Please provide us some feedback on how we can improve: http://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ
@askyourpartner Thanks for the photo!
@CarlosChangSV Hi Carlos, you would have to purchase an upgradable ticket and go through the United website at least 24 hrs in advance.
@ronmanwri Hello Ron, how can we help you?
@photoginthewild We'd love to have you on board soon!
2015 World's Best Economy Class and World's Best Economy Class Onboard Catering by #SKYTRAX! http://t.co/I8JLhdhLqR
Haven't tried our Economy Class yet? You should! We've just won this year's World's Best Economy Class by #SKYTRAX! http://t.co/k8VnEONrsO
@dsp_dsp Hope you enjoyed our flight with us! :)
@PoScoby Thank you for the kind compliments! We're glad you enjoy flying with us. Hope to see you on board again soon! :)
Book early & save on tickets to U.S. to Korea & Asia during our Internet Early Bird Specials! http://t.co/2rzyhUz8rO http://t.co/FIbF1MFVNk
@archakovolga Hi there, silver cards are no longer being issued. You may print our your card from My Account once you log in, instead.
@airlineguys Thanks for sharing! :)
@realbaek92 Hello. We are not doing a Melbourne giveaway at this time. Sorry!
@BoykeWijono Unfortunately, we are not offering refund fee waivers. You will have to check with your travel agent for refund process.
@samwongg Thank you!
Our 4th #ASIANA380 has now arrived! The #JFK route will operate the new #A380 daily! http://t.co/s5nuMTvoie
[ATTN] Our website will be undergoing maintenance on Tuesday, June 9th and some online services will be limited during 12:00 ~ 15:00 PDT.
@TurtleTrend @MacArthurInfo Most of the weekly flights will operate the B777, which means they will be equipped with the flat beds in biz.
Happy #NationalBestFriendsDay! Give a hug and a high-five to all your #BFFs today! http://t.co/6qrGtJlgkv
@ynwa_noel Hi Noel, you may want to double-check with our reservation center if you've already booked your ticket. Please call 800-227-4262.
@mwproject Hello Ed, our reservation center is available 24/7 at 800-227-4262. Thank you!
@abbbybie Hello Abby, the check-in counter opens 3 hours prior to departure time.
@YIXTAE We may have future concert ticket giveaways... No need to cry!
Thanks for all your entries, #BTSarmy and CONGRATS to @kpopfeelz! Please DM us to claim your concert tickets. http://t.co/zz7QbmYptF
We'll be announcing our #BTS concert tix and meet & greet winner shortly! Drumroll please... http://t.co/f47PDfPOSY
Good morning, Tweeps! #TGIF! Ready to take-off for the weekend? http://t.co/jFt3fzgWIv
@mwproject Thanks, Ed. We'll take note of it and appreciate your feedback. Thanks for choosing Asiana! :)
@WhiteJadeH Hi Jade, would you like to DM us the issue, along with your contact information? We'll forward it to the CR team to investigate.
@mwproject ... We'll forward it to the appropriate team to look into this further and assist you. Thank you!
@mwproject Hello Ed, sorry for the inconvenience. Mind if you DM us the problem you're seeing, along with dates/itinerary/email address?..
@ColinCoxSteiner Wow, thanks for sharing these photos, and for all the kind compliments! We hope to see you on board again soon! :)
@mongkoknights Hello Neil. Yes, that is the correct e-mail address, but please DM us your information and we'll forward it to our team.
Flying in #BusinessClass on our new #ASIANA380 from #JFK? We're offering chauffeur service in ICN, Korea! More info: http://t.co/lqxIAAaRds
